title: Kog'Maw PBE changes

embed.description: ( With the release of patch 6.20 to live on October 5th, we started the new 6.21 PBE cycle. ) Previous PBE Cycles in 2016 Below you will find a comprehensive list of new content, balance changes, and whatever else is included in the current PBE cycle!

body:
I as one of the 5 Kog'Maw mains in the world want to use this..whatever feedback thing to complain about the current changes about my favorite champ on the PBE.
The following is what they are changing.

    Living Artillery (R) 
        Mana cost lowered to 40 at all ranks from 50.
            Mana cost increase for subsequent shots also lowered to 40 from 50. 
        Time for mana increase for subsequent shots lowered to 8 seconds from 10 seconds.
        [new effect] Now does damage based on enemies missing health, from base up to 150% damage. Enemies below 40% still take extra (double base minimum) damage.
        Damage changed:
            NEW:
                Base:  100/140/180 (65% bonus AD)(25% AP) 100/140/180 (65% bonus AD)(25% AP)
                Base damage increased up to 150% based on missing health - 150/210/270 (97.5% bonus AD)(+37.5% AP)
                Damage to enemies below 40% health is double minimum base - 200/280/360 (130% bonus AD)(+50% AP)
            OLD:
                Base -70/110/150 (+65% bonus AD)(+25%AP) to enemies above 50%
                Damage to enemies between 25%  & 50% - 140/220/300 (+130% bonus AD)(+50% AP)
                Damage to enemies below 25%[240/330/540 (+195% AD)(+75% AP) 

And this is my problem: This takes a huge part of his current idendity (mainly for ap, but also in parts for ad) because the extreme good executes for low-health enemies is going to be taken away. Instead the basedamage is increased what is in my eyes no really good mechanic because it makes Kog easier but weaker. The manacost reduce is good and fine and stuff, but I as AP Kog'Maw main am convinced to a 100% that this change would make him more like a xerath in worse than the current design. Thats to be honest nothing good at all. For AD: also his strenght was to make people die easy when they want to get out because they are losing the fight. The sole point for this change is that he can have more tri-procs with the lower manacost. Thats it.
So I ask you to please not do that change.

Sincerely daBearSky

(just in case u think I have no idea what is good for kogmaw this is my profile (on lolskill.net http://www.lolskill.net/summoner/EUW/daBearSky/summary)

Hi there, youre probably a way better kog'maw player then me but i was surprized that you see this as a nerf. Imo this is probably a buff, cause it makes kogs ult more versatile. let me explain why i think so: first of all i dont think that the extreme execute (under 25%) was so good anyways because in most cases it was too much dmg which was not needed to low tagets escpacially for ap kog. for example a low heath adc has around 500 hp at 25 % health (a tank would maybe have 1000) and alone the base dmg would be enough for that but it also has a 75% ap scaling so in most cases u would deal way more damage then needed. moreover the pbe version still has increased dmg for low health targets and more base dmg above that with a smother transition. so i thought about the pbe update as a ult that does more dmg in more situations so ur not so relient on the fact that they must be low hp. and by that making him more versatile overall. also hes getting lower mana cost. at first i thought from 50 to 40 may not be that much but then i realized that it is actually pretty huge because the mana cost stacks so quickly. moreover a lower reset timer for mana sounds also nice :). I could of course be completely wrong with my theories, so I'm tense on an answer. ps now i see why kog has such a high winrate atm ... that build from champion.gg is exactly your standart build ^^ u must be really good with kog so maybe your right with your concerns. i just wanted to share my thought here and am curious on your opinion.
